survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Onboarding Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on their digital onboarding experience to improve future onboarding processes.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding materials were most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question; useful for identifying most effective resources.

script.question_text: Which of the following onboarding materials were most helpful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, did you face during the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, did you face during the digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of accessing the onboarding portal?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of accessing the onboarding portal?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question for actionable feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital onboarding process?
